disclaimer: This information is for educational purposes only and does not constitute legal advice.

superiorCourt.name: Superior Court of New Jersey, Cumberland County

fees.notes: Standard $75 filing fee statewide. Fee waiver available for indigent applicants. Clean Slate automatic expungement is FREE.

cleanSlateStatus.verification: Check status through NJ State Police
cleanSlateStatus.automaticExpungement: State system automatically processes eligible records
cleanSlateStatus.contactForIssues: Contact Criminal Division if expunged records still appear

procedures.filingLocation: File expungement petitions at Superior Court, Criminal Division
procedures.prosecutorNotification: Petitioner must serve copy on Cumberland County Prosecutor's Office
procedures.hearingRequired: Hearings rarely required for uncontested petitions
procedures.hearingLocation: Superior Court, Bridgeton if hearing scheduled
specialNotes: Cumberland County includes Bridgeton, Vineland, Millville
Rural agricultural county in South Jersey
Must serve Prosecutor's Office with copy of petition
Use certified mail with return receipt for proof of service

timeline.hearingNotice: 2-3 weeks advance notice if hearing required

forms.whereToObtain: Available at Court Clerk's office or NJ Courts website
additionalDocuments: Proof of payment of fines and costs

legalAid.name: Legal Services of New Jersey - Cumberland County
legalAid.services: Free legal assistance for eligible individuals

legalAid.name: Cumberland County Bar Association Lawyer Referral

expungementClinics.name: Cumberland County Expungement Clinics
expungementClinics.schedule: Scheduled periodically through legal aid organizations
expungementClinics.services: Free legal assistance with expungement paperwork

reentryPrograms.name: Cumberland County Reentry Services
reentryPrograms.services: Comprehensive reentry services including expungement assistance

notes: Cumberland County is largely rural with agricultural economy
Standard $75 filing fee applies (fee waiver available)
Clean Slate automatic expungement is FREE
